list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a thing serving as a visible or tangible representation of a fact, quality, feeling, etc.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I wanted to offer you a small token of my appreciation
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi muốn cung cấp cho bạn một token nhỏ của sự đánh giá cao của tôi

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a voucher that can be exchanged for goods or services, typically one given as a gift or offered as part of a promotional offer.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: redeem this token for a free dessert
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Đổi mã thông báo này cho một món tráng miệng miễn phí

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an individual occurrence of a linguistic unit in speech or writing, as contrasted with the type or class of linguistic unit of which it is an instance.
a sequence of bits passed continuously between nodes in a fixed order and enabling a node to transmit information.
a member of a minority group included in an otherwise homogeneous set of people in order to give the appearance of diversity.
done for the sake of appearances or as a symbolic gesture.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: cases like these often bring just token fines from the courts
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Các trường hợp như những trường hợp thường mang đến các khoản tiền mã thông báo từ các tòa án
